meInformation: ...who loves what she does, keen to keep learning and interested in working on new projects.
aboutMeInformation: I am a front end developer who loves what she does, keen to keep learning and interested in working on new projects. Having worked as a Website Coordinator for 5 years I found that what really fueled me was my passion to build websites that are easy to use and look beautiful.
project1Information: My resume website allows you to know me and my skills as a frontend developer. While developing the website, utilized Tailwind CSS for modern and responsive styling across the website. Integrated Toastify for user notifications and React i18next for multi-language support. Managed themes and user preferences with Redux and localStorage, and created a secure login form with React Hook Form. Employed protected routes and authentication tokens for security, with data generated through MockAPI and managed using Axios.
project2Information: A simple, customizable website allows your customers to order food by selecting ingredients. This was created with React and used styled-components for CSS management, flexbox for responsive layout, props for data flow, hooks for dynamic and efficient form state management and Cypress for tests.
contactTitleInformation: Got a question or proposal, or just want to say hello? Go ahead.
